#summary Roadmap for upcoming releases
#sidebar TableOfContents

The *IPT v2.0* is the *current stable release recommended for any data publishers* in the GBIF network. 

Only *small changes to address bugs will be added in 2011*, and these will be shown as "patch releases" e.g. v2.0.x.

The *best release to use is the highest version of x*, which will be the *featured download* from the [http://code.google.com/p/gbif-providertoolkit/downloads/list main download page]. 

*Estimated release dates can vary considerably* and are shown below mainly to indicate forthcoming functionality.

<wiki:toc max_depth="2" />

[http://code.google.com/p/gbif-providertoolkit/issues/list?q=Milestone%3DRelease2.0.2 issues to be addressed]

= Release 2.0RC3  =
This last release candidate will be working against the live registry already and allow to use the IPT for production publishing. Data published with this version will be able to migrate to the GA release without a change.

[http://code.google.com/p/gbif-providertoolkit/issues/list?can=1&q=Milestone%3DRelease2.0RC3 solved issues]
